Accepted Transcript Types

Only transcripts we can accept

Upload exactly one of the four types below

✓ Accepted formats
Why we’re picky
Our transcript automation relies on consistent, machine-readable sections. If the transcript doesn’t match these four formats, it either fails parsing or produces bad results. Bad results are fun for nobody.
Accepted Transcript Types
Use this page as a visual checklist. Each accepted type has its own section below with a sample that matches the IRS layout. Your upload should look like these, including the first-page header.
Account Transcript Record of Account Transcript Tax Return Transcript Wage and Income Transcript
Account Transcript
Used for balances, accruals, and transaction code activity. This transcript usually includes an “Information from the return or as adjusted” block and balance lines.

What it should look like

First page includes the exact sensitive-data header + the “Form 1040 Account Transcript” title.

Accepted
Internal Revenue Service
United States Department of the Treasury
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Form 1040 Account Transcript
Request Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Response Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Tracking Number:###########
Form Number:1040
Report for Tax Period Ending:MM-DD-YYYY
Taxpayer Identification Number:XXX-XX-XXXX
TAXPAYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
CITY, ST ZIP
--- Any minus sign shown below signifies a credit amount ---
Account balance:$0.00
Accrued interest:$0.00
Accrued penalty:$0.00
Account balance plus accruals (this is not a payoff amount):$0.00
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
** Information from the return or as adjusted **
Exemptions:01
Filing status:Single
Adjusted gross income:$0.00
Taxable income:$0.00
Tax per return:$0.00
SE taxable income taxpayer:$0.00
SE taxable income spouse:$0.00
Total self employment tax:$0.00
Return due date or return received date (whichever is later):MM-DD-YYYY
Processing date:MM-DD-YYYY
TRANSACTIONS
CODE EXPLANATION OF TRANSACTION CYCLE DATE AMOUNT
150 Tax return filed ###### MM-DD-YYYY $0.00
29221-137-64010-5
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data

$1
Record of Account Transcript
Combines return details and account activity in one document. It often looks like an Account Transcript plus return-summary fields.

What it should look like

IRS header + boxed sensitive-data line + “Form 1040 Record of Account” title, with right-aligned request/response/tracking.

Accepted
Internal Revenue Service
United States Department of the Treasury
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Form 1040 Record of Account
Request Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Response Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Tracking Number:###########
Form Number:1040
Report for Tax Period Ending:MM-DD-YYYY
Taxpayer Identification Number:XXX-XX-XXXX
TAXPAYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
CITY, ST ZIP
--- Any minus sign shown below signifies a credit amount ---
Account balance:$0.00
Accrued interest:$0.00
Accrued penalty:$0.00
Account balance plus accruals (this is not a payoff amount):$0.00
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
As of:MM-DD-YYYY
** Information from the return or as adjusted **
Exemptions:01
Filing status:Single
Adjusted gross income:$0.00
Taxable income:$0.00
Tax per return:$0.00
Processing date:MM-DD-YYYY
TRANSACTIONS
CODE EXPLANATION OF TRANSACTION CYCLE DATE AMOUNT
150 Tax return filed ###### MM-DD-YYYY $0.00
29221-137-64010-5
SSN provided:XXX-XX-XXXX
Report for Tax Period Ending:MM-DD-YYYY
The following items reflect the amount as shown on the return, and the amount as adjusted, if applicable. They do not show subsequent activity on the account.
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data

Tax Return Transcript
Shows line items from the filed return (income, adjustments, credits). It typically states that it does not show subsequent activity on the account.

What it should look like

First page includes the sensitive-data header + the “Form 1040 Tax Return Transcript” title, with right-aligned request/response/tracking.

Accepted
Internal Revenue Service
United States Department of the Treasury
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Form 1040 Tax Return Transcript
Request Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Response Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Tracking Number:###########
SSN provided:XXX-XX-XXXX
Report for Tax Period Ending:MM-DD-YYYY
The following items reflect the amount as shown on the return, and the amount as adjusted, if applicable. They do not show subsequent activity on the account.
SSN:XXX-XX-XXXX
Spouse SSN: 
TAXPAYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
CITY, ST ZIP
Filing status:Single Taxpayer
Form number:1040
Cycle posted:######
Received date:MM-DD-YYYY
Payment:$0.00
Exemption number:01
Income
Total wages:$0.00
Form W-2 wages:$0.00
Taxable interest income (Schedule B):$0.00
Tax-exempt interest:$0.00
Ordinary dividend income (Schedule B):$0.00
Qualified dividends:$0.00
Refunds of state/local taxes:$0.00
Alimony received:$0.00
Business income or loss (Schedule C):$0.00
Capital gain or loss (Schedule D):$0.00
Other gain or loss (Form 4797):$0.00
Total IRA distributions:$0.00
Taxable IRA distributions:$0.00
Total pensions and annuities:$0.00
Taxable pension/annuity amount:$0.00
Additional income:$0.00
Adjusted gross income per computer:$0.00
Refundable credits per computer:$0.00
Nonrefundable education credit per computer:$0.00
Qualified business income deduction:$0.00
Rent/royalty/partnership/estate (Schedule E) per computer:$0.00
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Page 1/1
Wage and Income Transcript
Lists third-party information returns (W-2, 1099 series, brokerage, etc.). The first section commonly starts with “Form W-2 Wage and Tax Statement.”

What it should look like

IRS header + boxed sensitive-data line + “Wage and Income Transcript” title, with right-aligned request/response/tracking.

Accepted
Internal Revenue Service
United States Department of the Treasury
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Wage and Income Transcript
TIN Provided:XXX-XX-XXXX
Tax Period Requested:MM-DD-YYYY
Request Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Response Date:MM-DD-YYYY
Tracking Number:###########
Form W-2 Wage and Tax Statement
Employer:
Employer Identification Number (EIN):XX-XXXXXXX
EMPLOYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
CITY, ST ZIP
Employee:
Employee's Social Security Number:XXX-XX-XXXX
TAXPAYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
Submission Type:Original document
Wages, Tips and Other Compensation:$X,XXX.00
Federal Income Tax Withheld:$XXX.00
Social Security Wages:$X,XXX.00
Social Security Tax Withheld:$XXX.00
Medicare Wages and Tips:$X,XXX.00
Medicare Tax Withheld:$XXX.00
Form 1099-B Proceeds from Broker and Barter Exchange Transactions
Payer:
Payer's Federal Identification Number (FIN):XX-XXXXXXX
PAYER NAME
ADDRESS LINE
Recipient:
Recipient's identification number:XXX-XX-XXXX
TAXPAYER NAME
This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data
Page 1/2
What we do not accept
  • Photos of a screen (low contrast, skew, missing edges)
  • Partial pages (missing the first page header area)
  • Redacted or edited transcripts (we need the full structure to parse)
  • "Tax Compliance Report" style summaries (not an IRS transcript)
Quick self-check
  • First page includes the phrase “This Product Contains Sensitive Taxpayer Data”
  • Title clearly says one of the following:
    Account Transcript, Record of Account, Tax Return Transcript, Wage and Income Transcript
  • The PDF is selectable text (you can highlight text, not just an image)
  • You included every page from page 1 to the last page
Transcripts contain sensitive taxpayer data. Upload directly through this secure portal for automated processing. Generated
